channel.title: ARO on DIVIDED DOCUMENTATION

item.title: ARO install
item.description: Proces instalace az provider register -n Microsoft.RedHatOpenShift --wait az account set --subscription 7504de90-f639-4328-a5b6-fde85e0a7fd9 az account show # je potreba pouzit az login na SP az login --service-principal --username 126501b0-ae03-4aad-aff2-19ced106b169 --password 05b154b3-afc3-42dd-bd53-746e6fa0d368 --tenant d2480fab-7029-4378-9e54-3b7a474eb327 export RESOURCEGROUP="aro-test" export LOCATION="westeurope" export CLUSTER="arozinite" az group create --name $RESOURCEGROUP --location $LOCATION az network vnet create \ --resource-group $RESOURCEGROUP \ --name aro-vnet \ --address-prefixes 10.
